build.buildCommand: pwd && echo 'Building shared package...' && pnpm --filter @syntera/shared build && echo 'Building chat service...' && cd services/chat && pwd && pnpm build && echo 'Verifying build output...' && ls -la dist/ && test -f dist/index.js && echo 'Build successful - dist/index.js exists!' || (echo 'ERROR: dist/index.js not found after build' && exit 1)

deploy.startCommand: cd /app/services/chat && pwd && ls -la && if [ -d dist ]; then ls -la dist/; else echo 'ERROR: dist directory not found'; fi && node dist/index.js
